QuestData.Title: Plug the Geysers
QuestData.Description:
Earthquakes! Snakes! Water coming from every direction.
What is going on around here?
Neri said to plug some holes in the defenses - didn't think she'd mean it literally.
Take some of this goo, next eruption, stick it in the hole.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seal all of the unstable geysers.
